metaData.label: ЖЗ
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Obstetrics Gynaecology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Embryology

metaData.label: Онко
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Chemotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology/Urology Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Oncology Radiotherapy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Haematology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Anatomic Pathology

metaData.label: Дети
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatrics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Neurology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child Dental Therapists OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Allergy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child Reanimation OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Allergy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Endocrinology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Child/Adolescent Psychiatrist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gynaecology Child OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Paediatric Oncologist OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Rheumatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Perinatology

metaData.label: Гастро
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Ultrasonic Diagnostics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Gastroenterology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Endoscopy OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Nephrology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pediatric Gastroenterology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dietetics OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Hepatology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Dermatology
